𒄩𒊏𒊒 ḫa-ra-ru
𒄩𒊏𒊒 deduct, hollow out, to break off, to dig

𒄩_𒉡 ḫa-zan-nu “Hassan” 𓄂 𓂝 𓀀 kḫatzhan 𒅗 zan?
𒄩_𒉡 mayor, village headman, a thorny plant
𒄩_𒉡 mayor 𓅓 𓂋 𓁹 mir ⇔ “Hussein” Husayn حُسَيْن ḥusayn √sehen ح س ن ḥ-s-n goodness…
